system.description: Your bonded artifact is more akin to a power source that can be endlessly repurposed. Whenever you finish a long rest, you may change the form of your bonded artifact (trading between a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}, or a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}). If you have any @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.krwn0da3yjm9lh57]{Relic Arts} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2ir4lcwwkzxvq0iv]{Artifact Whispers} that have a different bonded artifact form as a prerequisite, those features do not function until you return your artifact to that bonded artifact form.
